scripts.build-api-docs: rimraf api-docs.tmp && mkdirp api-docs.tmp/source api-docs.tmp/docs && cpx docs/api-docs/* api-docs.tmp/source && sed -i s@__env__baseURI__@$SERVER_URL@g api-docs.tmp/source/main.raml && raml2html api-docs.tmp/source/main.raml > api-docs.tmp/docs/index.html
scripts.validate-api-docs: rimraf api-docs.tmp && mkdir -p api-docs.tmp/source api-docs.tmp/docs && cpx docs/api-docs/* api-docs.tmp/source && sed -i s@__env__baseURI__@$SERVER_URL@g api-docs.tmp/source/main.raml && raml-validate api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml
